title: Dynamical Tits alternative for groups of almost automorphisms of trees
abstract:
We prove a dynamical variant of the Tits alternative for the group of almost
automorphisms of a locally finite tree $\mathcal{T}$: a group of almost
automorphisms of $\mathcal{T}$ either contains a nonabelian free group playing
ping-pong on the boundary $\partial \mathcal{T}$, or the action of the group on
$\partial \mathcal{T}$ preserves a probability measure. This generalises to all
groups of tree almost automorphisms a result of S. Hurtado and E. Militon for
Thompson's group $V$, with a hopefully simpler proof.
